testcase.name: test_daily_endpoint_returns_daily_buckets_and_totals

failure.message: Database threaded connections to 'writer' are not allowed in this test. Add 'writer' to observability.tests.test_daily.DailyEndpointTests.databases to ensure proper test isolation and silence this failure.
